mapper.insert: insert into sys_sign (id, formcode, formtype, account, username, actionname, signorder, signtime, actionflag, signremark, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{formcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actionflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{signremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_sign set formcode = #{formcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, formtype = #{formtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actionname = #{actionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signorder = #{signorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signtime = #{signtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actionflag = #{actionflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, signremark = #{signremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, formcode, formtype, account, username, actionname, signorder, signtime, actionflag, signremark, flag from sys_sign where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, formcode, formtype, account, username, actionname, signorder, signtime, actionflag, signremark, flag from sys_sign
